name: Beer Pong!
description:
Pony up, it’s Beer Pong time! The excitement of Beer Pong has made its way to PlayStation®Network. Compete against your friends or the computer in this ultimate party game favorite.
Play on a regulation table with up to 4 players. Make consecutive shots for the Fireball bonuses and Roll-Backs as you or your team try to dominate the table and reign as Beer Pong champs!
Speed Pong allows up to 3 challengers to compete at the same time. Speed and strategy are key in this fast paced game, so jack-up your opponents by using a slew of Power-Ups that will slow them down. The first player to sink the last cup wins it all!

1-4 players
HDTV screen resolution: 720p, 1080i
